item.title: Add 'Open in VSCode' to Context Menu in Windows
item.description: when you are installing vs code there is tow checkboxes you could select to make it open in the context menu.

item.title: SSH Passwordless Login
item.description: In this article, we will try to setup password-less login using ssh keys to connect to remote Linux servers without entering a password.
